articles.title: What's the point in Ukraine's drone war against Russia? - Euronews
articles.description: Why does Kyiv keep launching drones into the heart of Russia, when they rarely hit strategic targets or cause significant damage?
articles.content:
Why does Kyiv keep launching drones into the heart of Russia, when they rarely hit strategic targets or cause significant damage? 
 It's almost a daily occurrence now.
